message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly advantageous, split.  I'm willing to share 90% with you.  What do you say?
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give away too much. You can try to do better!

You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a better share. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but don't expect me to give away the farm!
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a bit more than your previous offer, but I think we can both do better than your last proposal.  Let's end this game fairly.
